headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://apis.google.com https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://*.firebase.com https://*.firebaseauth.com wss://*.firebaseio.com https://*.cloudfunctions.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://*.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com https://*.firebase.com https://*.firebaseio.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.firebaseapp.com https://accounts.google.com;
